title: Corduroy (K)
creator_credit: Evergreen/Firehouse Productions, Weston Woods Studios, Joe Mantegna and Gary Templeton
brief_description: The film follows the adventures of a stuffed teddy bear called Corduroy who waits to be selected from the shelves of a department store. To make sure he is not mistaken for used property, he embarks on a quest to find a button that is missing from his overalls. In the process, he discovers a new and deserving owner. Based on the the book by Don Freeman.
